g1.title: UNIT TESTING FRAMEWORK - Complete Operator Test Suite
g1.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all 85 @ operators using Jest/Mocha, mocking, test data generation, parameterized testing, code coverage reporting

g2.title: INTEGRATION TESTING SUITE - Real Service Validation
g2.description: End-to-end testing for databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB), cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP), monitoring systems, Docker containers, network scenarios

g3.title: PERFORMANCE BENCHMARKING - Speed & Memory Analysis
g3.description: Performance benchmark suite with benchmark.js, memory profiling, throughput testing, latency measurement, resource utilization, load testing

g4.title: ERROR HANDLING VALIDATION - Failure Scenario Testing
g4.description: Comprehensive error scenario testing, network failure simulation, authentication failures, rate limiting, circuit breaker testing, graceful degradation

g5.title: SECURITY TESTING SUITE - Vulnerability Assessment
g5.description: Security vulnerability scanning, SQL injection testing, XSS/CSRF protection, credential handling, API key rotation, TLS/SSL validation

g6.title: DOCUMENTATION & EXAMPLES - Usage Validation
g6.description: Comprehensive usage examples, API documentation validation, tutorials, code sample testing, documentation consistency, interactive playground
